name: Forest Frolic
description:
Play as Clara, a young elf who is on a quest to collect magical flowers. She has the gift of light magic, with which she can eradicate the evil spirits poisoning the forest. It's up to you to help Clara find ten flowers, and purify the land in the process!

This game was made in Godot 3.3.2. All assets and music were made by me. The framework for this game is based on BornCG's 2D platformer tutorial game series: https://borncg.itch.io/godot-platformer-part-17-demo
